display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (Apneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 4% oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with >= 3% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hrembp4 + hrop4 + hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + carbp4 + carop4 + canbp4 + canop4 + oarbp4 + oarop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4 + marbp4 + marop4 + manrbp4 + manrop4) / slpprdp
